name: LeanDo Technologies
tag_list: agile, scrum, lean, software, innovation, development, technical-debt, continuous-delivery
overview:
LeanDo Technologies delivers software using an agile and lean approach.

By establishing their methodology in Lean and Agile principles, such as daily scrums, continuous improvement (kaizen) and immediate focus on quality (Jidoka). They also foster solid teams, a challenging multi-cultural work environment, and a commit on 3-week development cycles as a corporate principle.

As a reference shareholder, WhatEver SGPS, founder of the first Sun Authorized Java Center in Portugal, also contributes decisively to the continuous evolution of their methodology, and further assures the corporate stability of the project.

milestones.description: LeanDo launched a continuous integration platform to help your code reach the top of its form.
